200202.n: Enterprise System Analysis, Integration and Security

200302.n: Enterprise System Analysis, Integration and Security

200402.n: Enterprise System Analysis, Integration and Security

200502.n: Enterprise System Analysis, Integration and Security

catList: This course covers various aspects of network components, network design, capacity planning, network management, system integration, Internet/Extranet/Intranet services, system and network troubleshooting and enterprise system security. Topics include Network Topologies and Standards; Transmission Media and Structured Wiring; Network Operating Systems; Network Design and Implementation; Network Management and Troubleshooting; Local Area Networks, Wide Area Networks; WAN Applications and Technologies; WAN Equipment; Hands-on Internet/Intranet Services; Information Systems Security; Hackers and Hacking Techniques; Security Tools; Secure Services; Data Encryption Technology; Virtual Private Networks; Disaster Recovery; Proactive Security Strategy and Policies.

This course will cover various aspects of network components, network design, capacity planning, network management, system integration, Internet/Extranet/Intranet services, system and network troubleshooting. Topics include Network Topologies and Standards; Transmission Media and Structured Wiring; Network Operating Systems; Network Design and Implementation; Network Management and Troubleshooting; Local Area Networks, Wide Area Networks; WAN Applications and Technologies; WAN Equipment; Hands-on Internet/Intranet Services.
